name: FZ-2 Hyper Fuzz
details:
FuzzThe FZ-2 is a distortion pedal with three modes: Fuzz 1, Fuzz 2 and Gain Boost. Fuzz 1 is used for a “booming” sound, Fuzz 2 for treble sound and Gain boost when the FZ-2 is used together with amp distortion. The FZ-2 attempts to create a fuzz sound reminiscent of the 60’s and 70’s but it also has the possibility to create a sound that is more in the grunge direction. The FZ-2 can also be used purely as a gain booster with no added distortion.
About 35 000 FZ-2 pedals was produced. There are no known production changes.
http://www.bossarea.com/boss-fz-2-hyper-fuzz/
